author: zsluedem
content: Hello Vid. I had a similar problem on debugging while I was developing. I created an integration test to test locally. I used anvil(like hard hat node) to start a test node. The node also supports debug_trace. I create some integration funtion like compile the abstract account solidity codes and deploy the codes to the local test node . I hope this could help you. https://github.com/Vid201/aa-bundler/pull/26/commits/87e292e2d1d82b645e3df9cdd497ba024a916347

author: vidkersic
content: That's also good for initial testing; I'll look into it. Tnx!
